properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the TrackChangesPreference (a Application).

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The change bar color, specified as an InCopy UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.

properties.description: If true, displays added text.
properties.name: showAddedText

properties.description: If true, displays change bars,
properties.name: showChangeBars

properties.description: If true, displays deleted text.
properties.name: showDeletedText

properties.description: If true, displays moved text.
properties.name: showMovedText

properties.description: If true, includes deleted text when using the Spell Check command.
properties.name: spellCheckDeletedText

properties.description: The color for added text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when added text color choice is change uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.
properties.name: textColorForAddedText

properties.description: The background color for added text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when added background color choice is change background uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.
properties.name: backgroundColorForAddedText

properties.description: The color for deleted text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when deleted text color choice is change uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.
properties.name: textColorForDeletedText

properties.description: The background color for deleted text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when deleted background color choice is change background uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.
properties.name: backgroundColorForDeletedText

properties.description: The color for moved text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when moved text color choice is change uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.
properties.name: textColorForMovedText

properties.description: The background color for moved text, specified as an InCopy UI color. Note: Valid only when moved background color choice is change background uses change pref color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or InCopyUIColors enumerator.
